title: Pool Boy
description: Fifteen-year-old Brett Gerson is a real-life S.R.K. (spoiled rich kid)–the guy you love to hate. Yep, Brett’s pretty much got life in the bag–until his dad is jailed for insider trading, and the family money swirls down the drain.Brett wishes things could go back to the way they were–until some dirty swimming pools change everything.
author: Michael   Simmons
